body:
Isn't the alignment right here?
`std::bind(&FileSystem::GetChildren, base_file_system_.get(), dir, result)` is one parameter and `initial_delay_seconds_` is the second.

Parameters to `std::bind` are aligned and parameters to `CallWithRetries` are algined
